name: The Fire in her Eyes
description:
My submission to the $102 Adventure Game Challenge.

You take control of Lynne. A young orphaned girl with dormant magical powers. But what is the source of her powers, and what does it want.

There are those out there that can help you use your powers, but are they helping for the right reasons?

Fire in her eyes has 11 unique endings (yes 11!) with one true ending. See if you can reach it! Some paths will lead to similar endings, some paths have much more of an ethical dilemma than others. Try it out and let me know what you think!
